creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: brown leather band with embossed basket weave; metal plaques on band with "ME" and lion; rectangular face with scroll, ladder and figure; blue gem on crown
markings: on back, incised: numerous inscriptions, including [1736], [925], [HANDMADE], [ME] and [MICHAEL ENDE]
medium: Gold and other metals, leather, gem stone
title: Israel's 40th Anniversary Commemorative Watch
